TopicTitle: Around the world with a jet (Let's play @ YouTube)

Articles.Content:
Heello!

I'm starting up a new let's play series of KSP and the first mission is a trip around the woooorld! With a jet. Just a little challenge I made for myself to get started. The first episode is out, next episode will be out during the weekend:

Episode 1:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/6R2YbsbPjhc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

After I'm done with this one, I'd like to hear your suggestions what to do next, so please post here or in the YouTube comments! I like challenges, but also might just do a standard career play-trough.

KSP playlist for future references:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/videoseries?list=PLlvkyQFw9o5oqyC6P3ODp09f4hnTkI-4-" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Also some other flight-sim stuff on my channel: [https://www.youtube.com/user/ThePressurewasherman](https://www.youtube.com/user/ThePressurewasherman)

The second episode is out. We're starting to be ready for our epic trip around the woooorld. Check out the beautiful landing in the end ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/sTfeVRfyUNM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

The aircraft is ready, plans are ready, so finally our epic(?) journey begins! The first stop will be the North Pole, since I might not have enough hard drive space to record the flight on one go ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/QuHAjHEZf6U?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

The second leg of our journey around the planet is flight from North Pole to South Pole. However, disaster strikes when I least expect it ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/YgH3zfz1GfE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
